by thieves who climbed up a fire escape and then used ropes to lower themselves into the museum. The thieves appear to have carefully selected some of the most valuable objects while ignoring less important artefacts. They are not something you would come and randomly find, an Egyptologist at Cairo's American University, Salima Ikram Said Salima Ikram , told Reuters.
